short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your Codeit experience with keyboard shortcuts and additional features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tap the ` key to toggle between 1x/2x speed, and the t key to fit the video perfectly on screen.

More learning hacks coming soon!
